summary: Removes some of the immersion-breaking things guards sometimes say when you walk by.
descriptionHtml:
Have you noticed how the guards seem to know you're a member of the Dark Brotherhood, a group that's supposed to be very secret about its members? Or how they seem to somehow magically know that you murdered some bandit leader for a contract? I have and I found it annoying and immersion-breaking, and this mod fixes that. It simply makes it so those lines of dialogue are never triggered, assuming this mod works.

[b]How to install/uninstall?

[/b]Simply drop the esp in your data folder or use a mod manager. Uninstall by removing the file (or using a mod manager).

[b]Load order

[/b]Place this mod after any mods that modify guard dialogue or it will not work, but before Alternate Start - Live Another Life (if you use that).
author: 3ventic
